channel.title: Recipes on cPanel's Favorite Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on cPanel's Favorite Recipes

item.title: Fruit Dip
item.description: Great with fresh fruit! Use apples, pineapple chunks, grapes, oranges or other fruits of your choice. Have toothpicks available to spear the fruit for dipping.

item.title: Chicken Ceasar Salad on a Stick
item.description: This chicken Caesar-on-a-stick appetizer is a fun twist on a classic salad!

item.title: Chicken and Waffles
item.description: This recipe has crunch, sweet and spicy, savory all in one.

item.title: Banh Mi
item.description: This banh mi (Vietnamese sandwich) is made with chicken and full of pickled vegetables. My husband works around a lot of Vietnamese restaurants, and I was making him bring me home these tasty sandwiches.

item.title: Grilled Chicken Salad Sandwich
item.description: This is a great way to use leftover grilled chicken breasts from dinner the night before. I like it on wheat. My husband likes it on sourdough.

item.title: Spicy Grilled Cheese Sandwich
item.description: Grilled cheese with onions, tomatoes and jalapenos– tastier than the original!

item.title: Joy's Easy Banana Bread
item.description: This easy banana bread recipe is quick to prepare, and everyone always comes back for seconds!

item.title: Perfect Summer Fruit Salad
item.description: The perfect fruit salad for a backyard bbq or any occasion. There are never leftovers! This is one of my favorite fruit salad recipes, as I think the sauce really makes it.

item.title: Classic Waffles
item.description: A lovely, crispy waffle perfect for the morning.
